website_summaries.verdict: This remarkably inexpensive product offers buyers a cheaper model with a variety of colors.
pros: Can work for both 3D pens and 3D printers
Includes 24 different color options, with three metal colors and six transparent colors for a sleek creation
cons: Many buyers complained of the ink emitting a foul odor

customer_reviews.title: This was a great set of sample colors to go with my new ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great set of sample colors to go with my new 3D Pen. THere's enough variety to make some interesting objects without running out. But, once you have a palette of colors you like to use, it probably makes more sense to buy larger spools of those colors. I'm almost out of the silver and the blue. I love that there were several tinted clear options as well as the silver/gold. Really is a nice range - which was why I bought this as a starter set. I made this bug using these PLA filaments - and an old sample shampoo bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Linzart

customer_reviews.title: Excellent refill kit
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to accompany the 3D pen that we purchased for our daughter. This kit comes with a wide array of colors and a very generous amount of each one. The price was right and each filament has fit perfectly in the 3D pen we purchased. Be sure to check the mm size of filament that your 3D pen uses to make sure it is compatible.
customer_reviews.author: MrsManders

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: 32 Colors 3D Pen PLA Filament Refills Okay, fair warning that I don't have a printer pen. I used these coils with my CR-10 printer. I wanted a variety of colors for some small prints, and this was a great way to get a lot for a low price. I really like the Mika PLA spools--whether matte, translucent, or shiny, they're consistently of the highest quality--and I was happy with these for my prints. I have D&D status condition rings in a bunch of different colors now! ~ Ana Mardoll
customer_reviews.author: Ana Mardoll

customer_reviews.title: Not really enough to ever print with,
customer_reviews.text: Not really enough to ever print with, but I use them as decoration next to my printer in an organized fashion and it helps my customers decide on a color they want their products printed in
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The picture shown, is deceiving. The big bun of colors is a handful of colors. I was expecting that big bun of 24 colors. Instead I got a bag with a few colors
customer_reviews.author: Nydia Valentin

customer_reviews.title: OMG!  The things the boy will create now.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson flipped his wig over this gift. He is 15 and all into 3D artwork. He was thrilled when he saw how much filament was in this package AND the variety of colors. He was so happy he ran off with the filament and made me a little 3D house within 30 minutes. Now he is no longer locked in a screen. He is enjoying creative thoughts and 3D artwork. His mind is stimulated and he is going on and on about the things he is planning to make. What a great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and consistancy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pack for my 3d printer to make multiple small items. I was very pleased with the quality of this brand of filament. I have printed 80% of the pack already and have had no issues with the filament. I have not changed the print settings for any of the colors/styles, even the transparents print the same. In my histroy the transparnets have usually caused issues, but this brand has been stable througout. I will definatly try to buy this brand again in the future. The only issue I have is that the colors were not labeled.
customer_reviews.author: Dane Wright

customer_reviews.title: Nice sample size
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price if you just want a small sample of colors. I barely got an Ender 3 and just wanted to test it out and this offers a nice variety for you to sample. Just know that it’s only 10ft for each color so you can’t make anything large.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy L

customer_reviews.title: Consistent, gorgeous, what more can I ask for?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try out a variety of colors for small prints on my 3d printer, and it does not disappoint. As a note to anyone with a 3d printer looking at this, this stuff won't get you very far unless, like me, you love printing things tiny. For small objects though? Amazing. Bed adhesion was perfect, extrusion was consistent, no jams, and even the solid colors come out with almost a satin look. I've only gone through the pink so far and I'm already in love. If you've had a printer for a bit and are looking to try a variety of colors before diving in with a full spool, this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great Sample Pack
customer_reviews.text: Great sample pack. I used several to make a multi layer print (see bird), and they worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with 3Doodler Start pen
customer_reviews.text: This plastic is not the right kind for the 3Doodler Start pen!
customer_reviews.author: Hendrickson’s

customer_reviews.title: Brittle to the point of being unusable
customer_reviews.text: The print I ran overnight failed because the filament broke and left a bit of it in the runout sensor. So the printer just run for hours with filament in the nozzle not extruding. This morning I am trying to clean the nozzle. Don't waste your money on this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Baker

customer_reviews.title: A Gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for a coworker who has a 3D printer. He brings in little toys occasionally for all of us and I thought it would be nice to get him some filament so he wasn't using his own all the time. Seems to work really well and he has had no complaints. The color assortment was great.
customer_reviews.author: Mysteri

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these Filament with assorted colors to make new figures with my daughter to avoid her screen time and its really work. She is always trying to use different color schemes to make her creations. she loves it i will buy more in summer vacation. I think every young kid should have this.
customer_reviews.author: Archana

customer_reviews.title: 10 feet is NOT much in the printing world
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors but wish there was more than just 10 feet. Does not go a long way at all. I got 2 cat bookmarks out of it for a friend (no raft) and the rest was waste. Ok for sample and small things as long as you don't print a raft with it.
customer_reviews.author: JessTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I got this and the pen for my 14 year old grandson and he didn’t like it. Says too complicated to use, so threw it away. I think this would be fine for someone who likes art and crafts.
customer_reviews.author: KWC

customer_reviews.title: My Pros, Great variety of color. Mild inoffensive scent . Low melt temp.
customer_reviews.text: Great selection of colors, it allows you to experiment without purchasing an entire roll and realizing the shade is slightly off. I prefer the PLA because it smells somewhat pleasent when melting. VS the strong chemical odor of pvc. Also melts at a lower temperature.
customer_reviews.author: eric jones

customer_reviews.title: Works Great with excellent color variety (Please Read Complete Review)
customer_reviews.text: Works well and I'm very pleased. Product being used with the Creality Ender 3 Pro 3D printer. No issues with feeding in this machine or the consistency and durability of the finished product. It should be noted that 10 feet is only enough for a 'test print' with a small file. Due to the distance from the feed rollers to the print head, about 18" of the overall length can not be used (measure length of the feed tube on your machine then subtract from 10' to determine the total usable filament for printing). This is an excellent way to check the quality the product.
customer_reviews.author: John Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit difficult to totally rate this purchase as it is part of a gift for my granddaughter. She hasn’t tried it yet. The filaments are awell-packaged, and a generous set of colors. Value for the price certainly and the package came swiftly. If this is as helpful as it is colorful, my artist will be very happy. If she’d opened the package, I’m sure this would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Joan C. Crenshaw

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Within 10 minutes, it gummed up my daughter's 3D pen. I returned the filament, but cannot fix the pen. The motor burned out.
customer_reviews.author: jeffershome

customer_reviews.title: smelly, burning plastic smell
customer_reviews.text: okay to work with but the smell is horrible. Smelling poisonous burning plastic might cause cancer.
customer_reviews.author: swp

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get the 3D pen to work!
customer_reviews.text: Probably may work okay, but not sure, since the 3D pen stopped working after 10 mins.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.R

customer_reviews.title: It Broke the Medoozy pen
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Medoozy pen for my daughter and this Printer Filament (as they state"Strong Compatibility:Universal compatible with most 1.75mm 3D Pens"). in the first use it got stuck and now we can't use the pen as i can't get it out!!
customer_reviews.author: Mali D.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work in 3d printer pen
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I have to give this product one star. They did get delivered in one piece unlike the last set of filament that we purchased from another company. But they did not work in our 3d printer pen as advertised they would.
customer_reviews.author: Comp-Tech

customer_reviews.title: Nice assortment of colors at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly as described, but doesn't melt as smoothly as another brand I used in past (could be an issue with my 3D printer too(. Regardless, the price was right and it [usually] works without errors. Overall, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: 3D Pen/3D Printer Filament,
customer_reviews.text: This filaments are not as big as they show in the picture, in fact they came in a small plastic bags, is not that bulky as it looks like, some of this filaments are reflective at night.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime79

customer_reviews.title: Bought as gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my niece who turned 8 recently, and her and my nephew really enjoy it. My sister face-timed me to show me the cool things they were making with it. Seems pretty neat for kids. I don't know anything about how the temperatures work on it, so it may require adult supervision. If you're looking for a gift idea for younger ones but aren't really sure what to get, I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Arron Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Solid puchase, if used quickly.
customer_reviews.text: A nice assortment of colors, but all of the filaments are sealed in one bag so one's that are not used are left exposed to humidity if you don't seal each and use silica gel packs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a pretty good set of filament refills. Going to use these with the MYNT3D Pen. There is a decent color assortment, but they tend to be on the darker / dull side. Not quite as bright as the ones pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Ryno D. Bones

customer_reviews.title: Might be good for a 3D pen but too short for a printer.
customer_reviews.text: Might be good for a 3D pen but too short for a printer, there might be better option with longer lengths. I find myself only being able to print very small items with a bowden tube but colors are great if you're able to ever find them for sale in 1KG rolls
customer_reviews.author: Naaman Mancia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy and color selection
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this with my MYNT3D Printing Pen and I was very surprised how great it was. The color variety is a nice way to start off, especially if you’re a beginner like me. Also, I prefer PLA over the ABS filament so I really like that all the filament is only PLA. It’s more easy to use and get exactly what you’re trying to create. This would be an excellent gift to anyone who uses filament because it goes fast, so the more the better.
customer_reviews.author: NotAnIzabel

customer_reviews.title: What pens does it eork with???
customer_reviews.text: It says it’s 1.75 but it will not work in the 3D pen we ordered. Can you help here. The pen we ordered said it’s the same size. Please help.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging and great product.
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a 3d pen, we have a 3d printer, but I wanted to build manually. This came Vaccumed sealed and packed in away that they were not directly stacked on top each other. It works well in my pen and it doesnt jam.
customer_reviews.author: Oriphiel

customer_reviews.title: ITS NOT PCL ITS PLA.
customer_reviews.text: I typed in PCL filament, saw this and swiped to buy. Yea, it wasn't PCL it was PLA. I'll do better reading the description so it doesn't break my 3d pen next time. :(
customer_reviews.author: fyeoms

customer_reviews.title: Good item to get for the price and quantity.
customer_reviews.text: My son-in-law bought me a 3 D pen for Christmas and I really enjoy making crafty things. So with the various filament colors it had I was able to make different things. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, makes a nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a gift for our son to use with his 3D pen. He’s used it a little so far and seems really happy with the quality of the filament. Good selection of colors for him to try out on smaller projects.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Has been creating amazing things since Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Bought so that my daughter has extra filament for her 3D pen. She loves it! Has been creating amazing things since Christmas. It is really neat to see plastic turned into butterflies, figurines, and so much more. Definitely going to get some more so she can create more cool things.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalia Roger

customer_reviews.title: Small print test
customer_reviews.text: This is a great selection of filinents for working with. If you wanted to test out diffrent collots to see what you like. This is great.
customer_reviews.author: William Hardt

customer_reviews.title: Great Variety
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go with my daughters 3d pen. She loves the variety of colors and has fun creating with them. She got them for Christmas and the seem to be lasting quite a while. I will buy them again once she runs out.
customer_reviews.author: G. Holt

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for use with my daughter’s pen she received at Christmas. The colors given were vibrant and easy to use with her pen. The metallic like colors are super cool.
customer_reviews.author: Candim

customer_reviews.title: LOTS OF COLORS
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter got one of the 3d pens for Christmas and had used up all of her filaments. Her pen used the 1.75mm size and this particular brand was the right size and lots of different colors for a really good price.
customer_reviews.author: PEG

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money..!
customer_reviews.text: Received item on time. My daughter really liked some of the transparent colors from the 24 colors. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Krish

customer_reviews.title: plenty of each color!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 8 year old grandson to go with his pen. There was plenty of each color and he was pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: donna yates

customer_reviews.title: So Fun!
customer_reviews.text: These pens are amazing. We bought two pens with the extra filament for our 5 & 8 yo boys. They love the pens. Our 16 yo daughter loves them too! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cortney milam burden

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: A nice assortment of colors, but all of the filaments are sealed in one bag so one's that are not used are left exposed to humidity
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Gore

customer_reviews.title: but it was a good selection and about the amount I expected
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it in crunch time at Christmas and it arrived in time. I ordered two and found out the packages vary in the colors that are in them, but it was a good selection and about the amount I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice color selection
customer_reviews.text: Got this for husband with his 3D pen. He enjoys the color selection. Good amount of product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LCollins

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great gift idea for anyone new to 3D pens, but also for anyone who enjoys using bright colors. I also received silver, gold, neon colors and even a clear filament.
customer_reviews.author: FILOMENA MIRABELLA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pack!
customer_reviews.text: This pack of filament is awesome! The colors are vivid and brilliant, and the diameter consistency is very good. The pack comes packed very very well. I even love the little pieces of tape that are around each color, they hold nicely and neatly and are very easy to remove. The filaments also print very well on my printer and my 3D pen. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Dubois

customer_reviews.title: Great filament but don't count on proper length
customer_reviews.text: The filament is good quality and prints without issue. I use this for color sample prints on my 3d printer. The reason I did not give 5 stars was this product is advertised as being 10' of each color. All of my color samples are the same print and run approx. 9'. 3 of the colors printed came up about 2' short and didn't finish the print. 14 of the colors measured were between 7'4" and 8'2.
customer_reviews.author: James l Braica iv

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this item as well as the pen. Someone had already given it to her.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: The item exactly as it was described in the specifications! Thanks to the seller!
customer_reviews.text: The item exactly as it was described in the specifications! Thanks to the seller!
customer_reviews.author: VARDAN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Good assortment of colors. More in the package than expected so thats a plus too!
customer_reviews.author: kstacy

customer_reviews.title: Easy purchase
customer_reviews.text: As I wrote before, this is a Christmas gift so I cant review until after that.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Lover

customer_reviews.title: NOT good for standard 3D Printers
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my Kingroon KP3 printer, and this is the only time I have ever seen burn while printing. Not only did it burn, but it globbed up on the nozzle of my 3d printer, and started to smell so bad that it caused me to cough. 100% do not reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon Jones

customer_reviews.title: good colors, vibrant
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for the 3D pens that the kids received for Christmas. None were broken and each are individually wrapped. Not sure that I would use this in a 3D printer, unless you have a very small 3D printer, just not long enough. Overall, good colors, vibrant, glittery and so forth.
customer_reviews.author: hopkinsd21

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Colors melted and dried the same color they were before they went in the 3D pen. Lots of colors for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great filament for my daughters 3D writer. Great deal for so many colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kelekea

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: Great selection for the price. My son has had a ball creating things.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this! He has made something everyday since he got it and I am beyond happy with the product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Whiddon

customer_reviews.title: Works good, little brittle
customer_reviews.text: This was so fun to play with, made many things. It's a little more brittle than desired works well.
customer_reviews.author: Felic

customer_reviews.title: Big coils
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my SO because he prefers the coils over the sticks. They work great in the 3D pen, the only con would be the sized of some of the cools and that making it difficult to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa M

customer_reviews.title: The item works great!
customer_reviews.text: They work nicely! All of the good colors they have to search in a spool of what you're looking for... :)
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Backman II

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to augment the filaments that were sold with the 3-d product. My granddaughter is loving this. I will probably buy her more. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gastanaga

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Came with lots of colors and the filaments were of good quality
customer_reviews.author: Annoying

customer_reviews.title: Lots of colors plus free finger protectors!
customer_reviews.text: The 3D printer pen I ordered only came with a few feet of a single color, so this was the perfect gift to go along with it. I love that it came with such a variety of colors, including metallic tones and a transparent one! Pleasantly surprised by the silicone finger covers, too.
customer_reviews.author: Julie U.

customer_reviews.title: 3D pen refills
customer_reviews.text: We got our grandson a 3D pen and got this to go with it. Perfect accessory
customer_reviews.author: nightmare

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love the vibrant colors. Easy to use. Product as described.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: Smell bad
customer_reviews.text: It smells very bad compare to another brand I have. Prefer not to use it.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Not a good prodcut
customer_reviews.text: The product is of low quality. It does not heat correctly.
customer_reviews.author: JEANINE RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. Love the fact that there are so many colors. Would definitely do a repurchase. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Littlkaren

customer_reviews.title: It was easy for her to use and to change colors
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter who is 11 years old. She loves it very much! It was easy for her to use and to change colors. I would recommend this product and suggest you order additional colors to go along with the pen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this 3D pen especially with all of the colors you can get for it

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This made a great gift my son and grandson are intrigued.

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.text: This is all i could do with my pen. It stopped protruding the filament after that....

customer_reviews.title: Idk
customer_reviews.text: I got these to go with my 3d pen and they didnt melt and got stuck in my pen. Basically broke it
customer_reviews.author: Keira Jade

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Love all the different colors. Nice and easy to use with the 3D pen
customer_reviews.author: ang spengler

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: Fits and works perfectly with the 3D pen I purchased. Was a gift for my grandson (10). He loves it. One minor observation...the picture is deceptive on the quantity.
customer_reviews.author: WiQ

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and is as described. Havent used it yet since it is a Christmas present
customer_reviews.author: Melissa LaRiviere

customer_reviews.title: Great pkg deal
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to 3d pen, but this bundle was a great deal. The colors were very nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this product, 😀
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colours, large variety ; the silicon mat is useful when precise geometric shapes are needed ; it is my first experience with the 3D pen , and I find it really nice !!!
customer_reviews.author: Mirela Ghetiu

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety of colors
customer_reviews.text: My son bought these for a 3-D pen, and loves the variety of colors. They work fine, and there seems to be enough of all colors to make plenty of little things.
customer_reviews.author: Mama B

customer_reviews.title: Happy shopper
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to gift someone either as a bundle with the pen or just as a refill kit
customer_reviews.author: Christina Schmal

customer_reviews.title: More than half of the filaments came in broken, ...
customer_reviews.text: More than half of the filaments came in broken, they are very brittle and snap as soon as you touch rhem.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Beautiful colors!
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety of colors! I would suggest this to any one who is looking for filament.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value to add many color choices
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my two nieces who both have these pens. They absolutely love the pens and all of the color choices. This is a must have add on if you buy the pen!
customer_reviews.author: sherri bencze

customer_reviews.title: Grandson
customer_reviews.text: This was for my 12 year old grandson. He hasn’t gotten to use it yet. Too many gifts for Christmas. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Lula Faucett

customer_reviews.title: The filament was in good condition when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: The filament was in good condition when it arrived. Unfortunately one bit of one of the colors had part of it broken. Only a small bit was damaged. I am happy with the rest of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan3

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for a 10yr old and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3-D Pen
customer_reviews.text: This item was given as a gift. The recipient is quite pleased with it and gave it a 4-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: DragonWoman

customer_reviews.title: son loved doing 3D pencil at school
customer_reviews.text: WE decided to get him a 3D pen and filament for Christmas . So excited I bet he will love this.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my Nephew and they were having so much fun, now I want one.
customer_reviews.author: Carmenlita C.

customer_reviews.title: Hours of play
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved it and couldn't wait to start creating. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Great array of  colors
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my son needed and wanted for his 3d pen.
customer_reviews.author: MMacGregor

customer_reviews.title: Too little
customer_reviews.text: No info on what each strand was or temp to extrude.
customer_reviews.author: r. c.

customer_reviews.title: Super fast turn around
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery, really enjoy the many colors. I purchased the assortmant for my school 3D printers to give the kids more choices, they are extremely excited, may go for longer lengths next time, most of our designs are right around 3 meters, so its good, so far
customer_reviews.author: G. Pedro Kinner

customer_reviews.title: Fun even for adults!
customer_reviews.text: Great fun! I got this for my husband to play with and he really has been having fun making little things.
customer_reviews.author: Morganhorse

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my 3 D pen. It says it uses this type of plastic but it does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Gambino

customer_reviews.title: Simple use product, great colors!
customer_reviews.text: We have a Polaroid Play 3D Pen, and could not track down the brand name filament but found these that are the same dimension! Tried them out this morning and it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC COLORS
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new 3D pen and I knew I would be burning through these refills. I was prepared and ordered them at the same time as my pen so I could play with it as much as I want. Great value for the money, vibrant colors.
customer_reviews.author: PXW

product_meta.title: 3D Pen/3D Printer Filament,1.75mm PLA Filament Pack of 24 Different Colors,High-Precision Diameter Filament, Each Color 10 Feet, Total 240 Feet Lengths by Mika3d
feature_bullets: Unique 24 Colors:It comes with 3 Metal Colors, 6 Transparent Colors and 15 Normal Various Colors; It's Great Gift for 3D Printing
